transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Many people have one.
🚦 You see me on the road.
🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and can go on the ocean.
⚓️ I need an anchor to stay still.
🚢 Sometimes I am used for holidays!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
🛬 I land at an airport.
✈️ I have wings and an engine.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
🚏 I stop at stations.
📣 Choo choo!

transport.question: I'm like a car, but bigger, and I carry lots of friends to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I usually am yellow.
✋ I have a stop sign that comes out.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 I can fit many people in me

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🏞️ I am good for riding in the park.

transport.question: I help people when they are sick or hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 My siren goes 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh!'
🚑 I have a special light on top.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I have a platform and handle bars. You stand on me and push with your foot. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 I'm good for when you are little to get around.
🛴 You push with your foot to go forward.
🧱 I am a lot of fun to ride on the pavement.

transport.question: I help put out fires, and I'm red and loud. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I use water to stop things from burning.
🪜 I have a long ladder on top.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters drive me.

transport.question: I dig in the dirt and help build things. I have a big scoop. What am I?

hints.text: 🚧 I am usually at a construction site.
⛑️ People wear hard hats around me.
🚜 I have a big arm that moves dirt.

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I keep you warm.
🌼 I look like a big flower in the sky.
⏰ I come out in the morning.

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you can see me at night. I change shape! What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 I have phases, like a crescent or a full circle.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 Some people say I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am tiny and twinkle at night, far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very bright
🌃 I live in the night sky.
🌠 You can wish upon me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and water, and you live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You are on me right now!
🌎 I am round.
💧 I have lots of water.

cosmos.question: I go around the sun, and I am red! What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am named after candy bar's color
🔥 I am called the Red Planet.
🚀 People want to visit me someday.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture! What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Sometimes I look like a bear.
🌌 I am a pattern in the night sky.
✨ People used to use me to find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, the biggest planet! I have a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ My red spot is a big storm.
🪐 I am very far from the sun.
👑 I am the king of the planets

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rock! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very sparkly.
💨 I am made mostly of gas.
🪐 I am very far away.

cosmos.question: I am a shooting star, a rock from space burning up in the sky! What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I leave a bright streak behind me.
🌠 I am also called a falling star
🌑 I burn up when I enter the air.

cosmos.question: Everything you see, all the stars and planets, are part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am very, very big.
✨ I am a collection of billions of stars.
🌌 Earth belongs to me.
